command.text: declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Loại phỏng vấn %s đã có hoặc lồng nhau trong danh mục.' else N'The interview code %s is invalid or already exists.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Loại phỏng vấn %s đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'The interview code %s has been modified or deleted by another user.' end

if exists(select * from @@table where ((ma_pv like rtrim(@ma_pv) + '%') or rtrim(@ma_pv) like rtrim(ma_pv) + '%')) begin select 'ma_pv' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_pv)) as message return end select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID

if not exists(select * from @@table where ma_pv = $ma_pv.OldValue) begin select 'ma_pv' as field, replace(@$recordHasBeenChanged, '%s', rtrim($ma_pv.OldValue)) as message return end if @ma_pv <> $ma_pv.OldValue begin if exists(select * from @@table where ((ma_pv like rtrim(@ma_pv) + '%') or rtrim(@ma_pv) like rtrim(ma_pv) + '%') and ma_pv <> $ma_pv.OldValue) begin select 'ma_pv' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_pv)) as message return end end
&ListWhenBeforeUpdateLog;
update @@table set datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where ma_pv = @ma_pv
